definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Eurasian hinterland (i.e. Central Asia including Xinjiang)
pinyin: Ya4 ou1 da4 lu4 fu4 di4

definition: (bird species of China) grey-bellied tesia (Tesia cyaniventer)

sentences.english: Putuo District is the hinterland where Shanghai plans to develop the modern service industry.
sentences.chinese: 普陀區是上海發展現代服務業的腹地。

sentences.english: Dunhuang in China, deep in the heart of the Gebi Desert, was once a great city.
sentences.chinese: 中國的敦煌，地處戈壁沙漠的腹地，曾經是個大都市。

sentences.english: Jinhongri knitting manufactory locates in Guangzhou, the delta hinterland along the pearl river.
sentences.chinese: 金紅日織造廠位於珠江三角洲腹地的廣州市。

sentences.english: Red bean exports two narrow gorge, the hinterland of the open, the shape of gourds .
sentences.chinese: 紅豆峽兩頭出口狹窄，腹地開闊，形似葫蘆。

sentences.english: Shaoyang will be another new important hub of communications in central Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 邵陽即將成爲湘中腹地新的交通樞紐。

sentences.english: The Huang-yang-lin antimony deposit is newly discovered and is located in the hinterland of the Xinjiang Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 黃羊嶺銻礦牀是新疆崑崙山腹地新發現的銻礦產地。

sentences.english: The desert sands in central Taklimakan Desert have peculiar engineering properties.
sentences.chinese: 塔克拉瑪干腹地沙漠砂具有特殊的岩土工程性質。

sentences.english: At the heart of Afghanistan is an empty space a striking absence where the larger of the colossal Bamian Buddhas once stood.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗的腹地是一塊空曠之地，人煙稀少。

sentences.english: By noon he was far into the alien country.
sentences.chinese: 中午他已經深入了這個陌生的國度的腹地。

sentences.english: Tanzanian hinterland here in width, grass green grass, Linquan matched, the environment beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 這裏腹地坦闊，草綠如茵，林泉相映，環境幽美。

sentences.english: The cause of the crash in Anbar province, heartland of the Sunni rebellion, was under investigation.
sentences.chinese: 遇難事件發生早阿巴省，伊斯蘭教叛軍的腹地。

sentences.english: The close relationship between a harbor and its hinterland has long been recognized.
sentences.chinese: 一般鹹認港口與其腹地之間有非常密切的關係。

sentences.english: Steelmaking cities in the American industrial heartland were battered over these decades.
sentences.chinese: 美國工業腹地的鋼鐵生產城市在這幾十年中屢遭重創。

sentences.english: This project is located at the center area of Rongqiao Peninsula, it is backed by mountains and facing water, the view of broad.
sentences.chinese: 項目處於融僑半島中心腹地，居山臨水，視線開闊。

sentences.english: Zabuye saline lake, situated in the hinterland of Tibet plateau, is a contemparysaline lake deposit.
sentences.chinese: 扎布耶鹽湖位於青藏高原腹地，是一個現代鹽湖礦牀。

sentences.english: The major active faults of Altai Mountains in backland of Asian continent are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中介紹了位於亞洲腹地阿爾泰山地區的活動斷裂。

definition: to be located at/to be situated in
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
to hold a pass/to guard (a strategic location)
(military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)
